channel.title: Operating System on Eclipse IoT
channel.description: Recent content in Operating System on Eclipse IoT

item.title: Which OS/RTOS makes sense for your Constrained Device? | Eclipse IoT Day Santa Clara 2019
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: This talk will survey the current open source options for an operating system to use (like Linux, FreeRTOS, Zephyr, mbedOS, RIOT, NuttX, etc.) in your IoT Constrained Device Stack. Factors to consider in selection include chip/hardware support, licensing, footprint, community health, open source best practices, security support as well as safety certifications available, all play roles.
